name: AI Dystopia
description:
You are a survivor in this world taken over by AI. Explore this world to learn new Abilities and Level Up to make yourself a stronger cyborg and be able to fight against them in Souls-Like combat.

Mouse and Keyboard and Controller are supported.

This Demo includes 3 areas.


Textures from Freepik:

https://www.freepik.com/free-vector/ground-cracks-top-view-earthquake-cracking-holes-ruined-land-surface-crushed-texture-destruction-split-damage-fissure-effect-after-disaster-isolated-transparent-background-realistic-3d-vector_12089345.htm#query=Ground%20cracks%20top%20view%20earthquake%20cracking%20holes%20ruined%20land%20surface%20crushed%20texture%20destruction%20split%20damage%20fissure&position=0&from_view=search&track=sph https://www.freepik.com/free-photo/metallic-textured-background_4139276.htm#query=Metallic%20textured%20background&position=18&from_view=search&track=sph https://www.freepik.com/free-photo/dirty-metal-texture_1025232.htm#query=Dirty%20metal%20texture&position=4&from_view=search&track=sph https://www.freepik.com/free-photo/texture-background_1167413.htm#query=Dirty%20metal%20texture&position=0&from_view=search&track=sph

Most sounds are from Freesound (more details in game credits)
